name: Yellow (Mrhee)
description:
Yellow is the title poem of Margaret Rhee's first chapbook published in 2011 (Tinfish Press). Yellow in its digitized form makes a statement on the objectification of race especially for Asian American women and enacts social commentary on avant experiments with language and color. The poem also sheds light on the violence of the racialized internet through form and content.
